column1: Cifuentes (Spanish pronunciation: [siˈfwentes]) is a municipality and town in the Villa Clara Province of Cuba founded in 1819 and established as a municipality in 1919.
In 2009 the municipality of Cifuentes had a population of 28
column4: 789 in 1976. With a total area of 512 km2 (198 sq mi)
column5: it had a population density of 56/km2 (150/sq mi).

column1: The municipality is divided into the barrios of Alacrán
